title: Clustering in Machine Learning
questions: How to use clustering algorithms to categorize data in different clusters
objectives: Apply clustering algorithms to different datasets
key_points: Using clustering methods, clusters inside a dataset are drawn using hierarchical, k-means and DBSCAN
For each clustering algorithm, the number of clusters and their respective hyperparameters should be optimised based on the dataset

workflows.name: Clustering in Machine Learning
workflows.title: Clustering in Machine Learning

history.message: test for clustering workflow and update to the workflow to have workflow_outputs
images are modified, workflow is added, zenodo is updatet and tiny changes
